values: What Makes the Good News Good (with German Interpretation)What Makes the Good News Good (with German Interpretation)

The greatest good of the gospel is that every obstacle is removed from us enjoying the presence of God forever, and the only way a person comes to know this is through God’s sovereign grace in the gospel.
